## CustomAnswersAgents.ANSWERS\_HEADLESS property

The ANSWERS\_HEADLESS agent should not be supplied. Instead, it will be automatically added to the header and populated with the version of Answers Headless being used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'ANSWERS_HEADLESS'?: never;
```
